text:
On Enoshima Beach, basking in strong sunlight,
a voice called out to [Player].

name: Alend
text:
It's you, [Player].
Are you also taking a break?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Alend
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, good work to you too.
Even though I was told it was free time, I couldn't think of anything I wanted to do.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Alend
dialogue_after_selection.text: I was thinking of going to Enoshima's urban area to observe the infrastructure, but—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Alend
dialogue_after_selection.text:
If you're here, that's a different story.
I'd like to enjoy the beach a little too, so would you accompany me?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Alend
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Is that so...?
I didn't choose it myself, so I'm not really aware of it, but—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Alend
dialogue_after_selection.text:
If you say so, I think I can face the photoshoot with confidence.
Watch me, for I'll deliver you results.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Alend
dialogue_after_selection.text:
W-Well, there's time until the photoshoot.
Until then, I want to enjoy our time together.
Would you accompany me...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Alend
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Is that so...?
I'm just wearing what I was given, so I'm not really sure about it myself.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Alend
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, please don't stare at me that closely.
...Now that I've said that, I'm feeling a little embarrassed myself.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Alend
dialogue_after_selection.text:
A-anyway, it's time for a break!
Let's go for a walk on the beach, and I'm bringing you with me.

options.text: It seems to be an Enoshima specialty.

name: Alend
text:
What is that bottle?
...Sun oil?
And you want to apply it to me...?

name: Alend
text:
I usually work in environments
worse than Earth, you know?
Skin care now for me is...

name: Alend
text:
...Ah, no.
Sorry, [Player].
I don't mean to reject your kindness.

name: Alend
text:
I'm not very familiar with private physical contact,
so it's a bit embarrassing, but—

name: Alend
text:
Honestly, I don't have an answer
to this kind of invitation.
...The rest is up to you.

name: Alend
text:
Oh, that's right.
If I'm applying sun oil, my jacket will be in the way, won't it?
Please wait a moment.

name: Alend
text:
Should I just stay still here?
Once again, I'm counting on you.

name: Alend
text:
Applying oil to my body is
a strange sensation, but...
I see, it's not too bad.

name: Alend
text:
Haha, it's nice to do this sometimes.
To have someone act for me,
instead of me acting for others.

name: Alend
text:
W-Wait a minute!
I appreciate the carefulness,
but it tickles a little...!

name: Alend
text:
...I-I know it's a little too late to say this, but...
Being this close, is a bit embarrassing.

[Player] and Alend enjoyed
their intimate time together.

name: Alend
text:
[Player], thank you.
Thanks to you, I got a valuable experience.

name: Alend
text:
...Well then, it's your turn.
Give me that bottle, I'll try to do it
while remembering how your hands went.

name: Alend
text:
I'm not really used to it, so...
I don't know if I can do it as well as you did earlier,
but I'll be gentle... I intend to.
